segments.text: I'm starting to feel quite uncomfortable watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water on the floor is becoming really concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading across the floor, a growing pool of potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the wetness and stickiness of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Think of the damage to the cabinets and the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a complete disregard for property, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they're so preoccupied with their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could easily fall and hit their heads on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of water and climbing is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is rather sickening to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating display of obliviousness and risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
